mapper.select: SELECT pl.RANSOM_CODE ransomCode, pl.PART_CODE partCode, pl.EST_PART_TIME estPartTime, (SELECT TOP 1 CHANGE_REASON FROM sctrans.T_RA_PLAN_HISTORY his WHERE his.PART_CODE = pl.PART_CODE ORDER BY his.CREATE_TIME DESC) remark, pl.CREATE_TIME createTime, pl.CREATE_USER createUser, pl.UPDATE_TIME updateTime, pl.UPDATE_USER updateUser FROM sctrans.T_RA_PLAN pl WHERE pl.RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT PART_CODE partCode FROM sctrans.T_RA_PLAN WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT ra.RANSOM_CODE ransomCode, ra.BORRO_MONEY borrowerMoney, vie.INTERVIEW_MONEY interViewMoney, vie.INTEREST interest, vie.IS_ENTRUST isEntrust, rep.REPAY_MONEY repayLoanMoney FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE ra LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW vie ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = vie.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rep ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = rep.RANSOM_CODE WHERE ra.RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT RANSOM_CODE ransomCode, CASE_CODE caseCode, RANSOM_STATUS ransomStatus, COM_ORG_CODE comOrgCode, BORRO_MONEY borroMoney, BORROWER_NAME borrowerName, BORROWER_TEL borrowerTel, ISSTOP isstop, STOP_TYPE stopType, STOP_REASON stopReason, ACCEPT_TIME acceptTime, ISAPPLY isApply, CREATE_TIME createTime, CREATE_USER createUser, UPDATE_TIME updateTime, UPDATE_USER updateUser FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE WHERE 1=1
and CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT GUEST_CODE guestCode, CASE_CODE caseCode, GUEST_NAME guestName, GUEST_PHONE guestPhone FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT FIN_ORG_NAME finOrgName, FIN_ORG_CODE finOrgCode, FA_FIN_ORG_CODE faFinOrgCode, FIN_ORG_NAME_YC finOrgNameYc FROM sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG WHERE FIN_ORG_CODE = #{finOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT cai.CASE_CODE caseCode, cai.RANSOM_CODE ransomCode, app.APPLY_TIME applyTime, app.REMAKE applyRemake, app.part_code partCode,
inter.INTERVIEW_TIME interviewTime, inter.REMAKE interviewRemake, inter.part_code partCode,
rep.REPAY_TIME repayTime, rep.REMAKE repayRemake, rep.part_code partCode,
can.CANCEL_TIME cancelTime, can.REMAKE cancelRemake, can.part_code partCode,
red.REDEEM_TIME redeemTime, red.REMAKE redeemRemake, red.part_code partCode,
pay.PAYMENT_TIME paymentTime, pay.REMAKE paymentRemake, pay.part_code partCode FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE cai LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_APPLY app ON cai.RANSOM_CODE = app.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW inter ON inter.RANSOM_CODE = app.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rep ON rep.RANSOM_CODE = inter.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL can ON can.RANSOM_CODE = rep.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM red ON red.RANSOM_CODE = can.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT pay ON pay.RANSOM_CODE = red.RANSOM_CODE WHERE cai.RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT ca.CASE_CODE caseCode, pro.PROPERTY_ADDR propertyAddr, cai.AGENT_NAME agentName, cai.GRP_NAME grpName, guest.GUEST_NAME seller, guest.GUEST_PHONE sellPhone, guest1.GUEST_NAME buyer, guest1.GUEST_PHONE buyPhone, par.USER_NAME userName, par.REAL_NAME realName FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO ca INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO pro ON ca.CASE_CODE = pro.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO cai ON pro.CASE_CODE = cai.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO guest ON cai.CASE_CODE = guest.CASE_CODE and guest.TRANS_POSITION='30006001' INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO guest1 ON cai.CASE_CODE = guest1.CASE_CODE and guest1.TRANS_POSITION='30006002' INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_PARTICIPANT par ON guest.CASE_CODE = par.CASE_CODE WHERE par.POSITION = 'warrant' AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT cas.CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE cas WHERE cas.CASE_CODE = ca.CASE_CODE) AND ca.CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT COUNT(RANSOM_CODE) FROM sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS tai,sctrans.T_TO_CASE cai with(nolock) WHERE cai.CASE_CODE = tai.CASE_CODE AND LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY LEADING_PROCESS_ID

select COUNT(C.RANSOM_CODE) from sctrans.T_TO_CASE A, sctrans.T_RA_CASE C where LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.CASE_CODE = C.RANSOM_CODE and datediff(month,C.UPDATE_TIME,getdate())=0 GROUP BY LEADING_PROCESS_ID

SELECT cas.CASE_CODE caseCode, cas.RANSOM_CODE ransomCode,
app.PART_CODE applyCode, app.APPLY_TIME applyTime, vie.PART_CODE signCode, vie.INTERVIEW_TIME signTime, rr1.PART_CODE payOneCode, rr1.REPAY_TIME payOneTime, rr2.PART_CODE payTwoCode, rr2.REPAY_TIME payTwoTime, rca1.PART_CODE cancelOneCode, rca1.CANCEL_TIME cancelOneTime, rca2.PART_CODE cancelTwoCode, rca2.CANCEL_TIME cancelTwoeTime, rre1.PART_CODE receiveOneCode, rre1.REDEEM_TIME receiveOneTime, rre2.PART_CODE receiveTwoCode, rre2.REDEEM_TIME receiveTwoTime, rp.PART_CODE paymentCode, rp.PAYMENT_TIME paymentTime, (SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.SYS_USER sy WHERE sy.ID = tw.UPDATE_BY ) doUser FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE cas LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW tw ON cas.RANSOM_CODE =tw.BIZ_CODE
LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_APPLY app ON app.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW vie ON vie.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE
LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rr1 ON rr1.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE AND rr1.PART_CODE = 'PAYLOAN_ONE' LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rr2 ON rr2.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE AND rr2.PART_CODE = 'PAYLOAN_TWO'
LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL rca1 ON rca1.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE AND rca1.PART_CODE = 'CANCELDIYA_ONE' LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL rca2 ON rca2.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE AND rca2.PART_CODE = 'CANCELDIYA_TWO'
LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM rre1 ON rre1.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE AND rre1.PART_CODE = 'RECEIVE_ONE' LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM rre2 ON rre2.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE AND rre2.PART_CODE = 'RECEIVE_TWO'
LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT rp ON rp.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE WHERE
cas.RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sctrans.T_RA_PLAN( RANSOM_CODE, PART_CODE, EST_PART_TIME, REMARK, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER ) VALUES( #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{estPartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO sctrans.T_RA_PLAN( RANSOM_CODE, PART_CODE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME )VALUES
( #{item.ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into sctrans.T_RA_CASE ( RANSOM_CODE, CASE_CODE, RANSOM_STATUS, RANSOM_PROPERTY, COM_ORG_CODE, BORRO_MONEY, BORROWER_NAME, BORROWER_TEL, ISSTOP, STOP_TYPE, STOP_REASON, ACCEPT_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, FIN_ORG_ID, REMARK ) values ( #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ransomStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ransomProperty,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{comOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{borroMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{borrowerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{borrowerTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isstop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stopType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stopReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acceptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finOrgId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE sctrans.T_RA_CASE SET
RANSOM_STATUS = #{ransomStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANSOM_PROPERTY = #{ransomProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BORROWER_NAME = #{borrowerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BORROWER_TEL = #{borrowerTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BORRO_MONEY = #{borroMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISAPPLY = #{isApply,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE sctrans.T_RA_CASE SET CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update.foreach: UPDATE sctrans.T_RA_PLAN SET EST_PART_TIME = #{item.estPartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{item.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{item.ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PART_CODE = #{item.partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.update:
UPDATE sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS SET
SIGN_TIME = #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FIN_ORG_CODE = #{finOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MORTGAGE_TYPE = #{mortgageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOAN_MONEY = #{loanMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REST_MONEY = #{restMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE() WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DIYA_TYPE = #{diyaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS SET CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE sctrans.T_RA_APPLY SET APPLY_TIME = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMAKE = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW SET INTERVIEW_TIME = #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMAKE = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE sctrans.T_RA_REPAY SET REPAY_TIME = #{mortgageTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMAKE = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL SET CANCEL_TIME = #{cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMAKE = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM SET REDEEM_TIME = #{redeemTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMAKE = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT SET PAYMENT_TIME = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMAKE = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT act.TASK_DEF_KEY_ FROM sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW tw LEFT JOIN sctrans.ACT_RU_TASK act ON tw.INST_CODE = act.PROC_INST_ID_
WHERE tw.BIZ_CODE= #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT rac.RANSOM_CODE ransomCode, rac.RANSOM_STATUS ransomStatus, act.TASK_DEF_KEY_ partCode, tw.INST_CODE instCode FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE rac LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW tw ON rac.RANSOM_CODE = tw.BIZ_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.ACT_RU_TASK act ON tw.INST_CODE =act.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE rac.RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sctrans.T_RA_PLAN_HISTORY( RANSOM_CODE, PART_CODE, OLD_EST_PART_TIME, NEW_EST_PART_TIME, CHANGE_REASON, CHANGER_ID, CHANGE_TIME, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME ) VALUES( #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldEstPartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{newEstPartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: SELECT PART_CODE partCode, OLD_EST_PART_TIME oldEstPartTime, NEW_EST_PART_TIME newEstPartTime, (SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.SYS_USER WHERE ID = CHANGER_ID) changeName, CHANGE_TIME changeTime, CHANGE_REASON reason FROM sctrans.T_RA_PLAN_HISTORY WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
